main event: A sighting of an unidentified flying object (UFO) occurred in St. Paul, Minnesota on March 22, 1967, as reported by civilian witnesses.
interesting points: The sightings involved multiple witnesses including a mother and daughter who described seeing a light that lifted and made a hissing sound., The object was seen to move at high speeds and changed direction abruptly., A farmer and his son observed the object for several minutes, noting its bright lights and lack of sound., Reports suggest that two USAF anti-submarine patrol aircraft were conducting training flights in the vicinity around the time of the sightings., The final analysis proposed that the light might have been part of the aircraft searchlight activity.
sighted object: unidentified flying object (UFO) emitting bright light
witness description: A mother, her 12-year-old daughter, a farmer, and his 20-year-old son.
